snippet.title: Raptor RPG - Fishing with Developer
snippet.description:
I have found the easiest way to catch fish is to not chase them, but to stand back, let the fish hit the wall and bounce off, line yourself up then bite!  ^_^
...
- Fish in your mouth can be eaten anytime using the action button, eat now or eat later, or even take it for a walk if you want too.
- Can be used like a Medi/Health pack, have one in your mouth when fighting bosses or players, when health is low, eat fish to heal  :3
- Fishing levels increase from your total fish amount.
- Higher fishing levels give greater chance of bigger fish appearing.
- Bigger fish restore more health and hunger.
- Every time you get a longer or heavier fish, you get a new personal record, and pack points equal to your fishing level.
...
______________________________
Fishing was added, like many other features, as it was requested by lots of players!
______________________________
Also known as:
( RRPG, Raptor RPG MMO, Raptor RPG Online and Raptorpg )
______________________________
Video was recorded using iPad, plugged into Laptop, using Quicktime's movie record option.
(records screen and audio from device straight to laptop, simple, easy, high quality and not complicated! )
______________________________
www.StephenAllenGames.co.uk
Check out my other games, most are FREE!
Dragons Online, Raptors Online, Hill Cliff Horse, Ocean Craft Multiplayer, Disillusions Manga Horror
______________________________
